scripts.nuxi-upgrade: pnpm nuxt upgrade ./app/core && pnpm nuxt upgrade ./packages/finance && pnpm nuxt upgrade ./packages/ui && pnpm nuxt upgrade ./packages/server
scripts.nuxi-clean: pnpm nuxt cleanup ./app/core && pnpm nuxt cleanup ./packages/ui && pnpm nuxt cleanup ./packages/server && pnpm nuxt cleanup ./modules/dashboard
scripts.purge-nuxt: rm -r ./packages/ui/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/ui/.nuxt && rm -r ./packages/server/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/server/.nuxt && rm -r ./app/core/node_modules && rm -r ./app/core/.nuxt && rm -r ./modules/dashboard/.nuxt && rm -r ./modules/dashboard/node_modules
scripts.purge-all: rm -r ./node_modules && rm ./pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -r ./packages/ui/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/ui/.nuxt && rm -r ./app/core/node_modules && rm -r ./app/core/.nuxt && rm -r ./modules/dashboard/.nuxt && rm -r ./modules/dashboard/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/server/.nuxt && rm -r ./packages/server/node_modules
